org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss
Interface CredentialManagerService

All Superinterfaces:
org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.PortletService
All Known Implementing Classes:
CredentialManagerServiceImpl
public interface CredentialManagerService
extends org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.PortletService

Describes a service for creating and maintaining credential contexts, where a credential context maintains a handle to a GSS credential for a given user. This service also provides convenient methods for accessing credential contexts, the credentials and credential resource mappings contained therein.

See Also:
GSSCredential, CredentialContext, CredentialMapping

public CredentialContext createCredentialContext(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user,
                                                 java.lang.String dn)
                                          throws CredentialException
Creates a credential context for the given user and distinguished name. Throws an exception if a credential context already exists for the given user and distinguished name.

dn - The distinguished name

activateCredentialContext

public CredentialContext activateCredentialContext(org.ietf.jgss.GSSCredential credential)
                                            throws CredentialException
Activates the credential context that is associated with the given credential. Returns the activated context if one exists for the credential, throws an exception otherwise.

Parameters:
credential - The credential
Returns:
The activated credential context
Throws:
CredentialException

getActiveCredentialContexts

public java.util.List getActiveCredentialContexts(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)
Returns the active credential contexts for the given user. If no active credential contexts are found, returns an empty list.

Parameters:
user -
Returns:
The list of active credential contexts
See Also:
CredentialContext

getActiveCredentialContexts

public java.util.List getActiveCredentialContexts(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user,
                                                  GssEnabledResource resource)
Returns the active credential contexts for the given user and resource. If no specific contexts are mapped to the given resource, returns an empty list.

Parameters:
user - The user
resource - The resource

getDefaultCredentialContext

public CredentialContext getDefaultCredentialContext(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)
Returns the first active credential context found for the given user. Returns null if no active credential contexts found.

Parameters:
user - The user
Returns:
The active credential context if found, null otherwise

getCredentialResourceMappings

public java.util.List getCredentialResourceMappings(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)
Returns the union of all the credential resource mappings that are associated with the credential contexts that belong to the user. Returns an empty list if no resource mappings are found.

Parameters:
user -
Returns:
The list of credential resource mappings.

getSaveActiveCredentialsToFile

Returns:
True if configured to save credentials to files, false otherwise.
